description: '''Milagros del Rosario Quezada Borb√≥n''' (born May 21, 1955) is a Dominican-American singer specializing in [[Merengue music|Merengue]]. She is a four-time [[Latin Grammy Awards|Latin Grammy Award]] winner and has been referred to as the [[Honorific nicknames in popular music|"Queen of Merengue"]] because of her impact on the world of merengue music.
